title: MSME Invest Connect
description: A full-stack MERN marketplace connecting MSMEs with investors. Features authentication, real-time data, and investment tracking.

title: Bus Fleet Management
description: Real-time bus tracking and route optimization system for students. Features live ETAs and notification alerts.

title: AI Learning Style Predictor
description: Interactive dashboard analyzing student learning patterns using FSLSM dimensions and CatBoost machine learning.

title: Q-A ChatBot
description: Intelligent conversational assistant built with LangChain and LLMs for automated question answering.

title: Deepfake Detection
description: Computer vision system to detect and analyze deepfake media using advanced deep learning models.

title: Shadow Removal System
description: Advanced image processing pipeline for detecting and removing shadows from images using deep neural networks.

title: FinanceOwl
description: A full-stack expense tracker application to track income, expenses, and visualize financial health.

title: LeetMetric
description: An application to track and analyze LeetCode problem-solving progress and metrics.

title: Invoice Extractor
description: Automated tool for extracting structured data from invoices using OCR and NLP techniques.

title: Pinecone & LangChain Search
description: Semantic search implementation using Pinecone vector database and LangChain framework.

title: Blog Generator
description: AI-powered blog post generator leveraging Llama models and LangChain for content creation.

title: PDF Query System
description: Document question-answering system using LangChain and Cassandra for efficient PDF querying.
